features: Lightweight and small design stick vacuum cleaner , weighing less than 3 Ib, is extremely easy to use, and can be put into the desk drawer for storage after disassembly. It is a choice for pursuing easy housework.

Compared with the cordless vacuum of the same grade, the corded small vacuum cleaner with mini size but strong suction force has increased by 50% to 14000pa. Fine dust, pet hair, large particles such as cat litter can be easily handled , Brushless design eliminates the problem of entangled hair with a roller brush.

The corded stick vacuum can be used by removing the pipe, equipping replacement crevice nozzle, converting to handy cleaner for continuous operation on all kinds of hardwood floors, short pile carpet and windowsills, sofa and bed, desk and curtain, etc.
More stable and durable with the cable design.Fashion color.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: KEROMEE Stick Vacuum Cleaner BX219 Lightweight and small design vacuum cleaner , weighing less than 3 Ib, is extremely easy to use, and can be put into the desk drawer for storage after disassembly. It is a good choice for pursuing easy housework.Compared with the cordless vacuum of the same grade, the corded stick vacuum cleaner with small size but strong suction force has increased by 50% to 14000pa.Fine dust, hair, large particles such as cat litter can be easily handled .Brushless design eliminates the problem of entangled hair with a roller brush.BX-219 corded vacuum cleaner can be used by removing the pipe, equipping replacement crevice nozzle, converting to handy cleaner for continuous operation on all kinds of hardwood floors, short pile carpet and windowsills, sofa and bed, desk and curtain, etc.It is adjustable and flexible, 120° swivel sideways and 90° up and down, lets you clean your home in all directions.
Meet Your Daily Needs Product Information: Product model:BX-219 vacuum cleanerVacuum suction:14000PaPower cord length:13ftProduct weigth:3lbProduct Motor:400W
KEROMEE BX219 comes with two connected tubes, allowing for a length adjustment range of 19.7-43.5 inch.

How to clean the vacuum cleaner? 1. Rotate and open the dust cup,please be carefully when rotate it. 2. Remove the filter and clean it, washable filter,please wash the filter ,dust cup and metal mesh only. 3. Wait for the filter and mesh to dry completely and then put it back. Important tips: 1.For better suction and use,please clean the filter regularly. 2.Please do not use it upon the water or decortation fine dust, that may damage the vacuum. 3.Any question, please eml us for help.Thank you.

Friendly reminder KEROMEE is the original manufacturer of vacuum cleaners, and is committed to providing customers with high-quality products.Due to long distance transportation, if the product is damaged when you get it, please eml us or Amazon directly, we will deal with your problem as soon as possible, thank you for your kindly trust.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great lightweight vacuum
reviews.reviewText: I’m very pleased with this vacuum. I’ve been using it for quite some time before writing this review. It’s very effective at picking up trash on my hardwood floors. My dogs track in a lot of grass and debris from the yard. I use it almost daily. I like that it will easily fit under the furniture due to the low profile of the floor attachment. It’s very lightweight and easy for me to use. I can quickly use it to pick up the trash on the floor, dump the dust cup and recharge for the next use. It picks up everything on my floor using the low setting. I’ve never had to use the high setting. I’m surprised by the suction it has. It’s a great vacuum and the price is a deal.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars That it actually works!!!
reviews.reviewText: With dogs coming in and out, we’re always having to sweep or vacum. Ever since Swifter stop making their cordless swifter sweeper we’ve been having to take out our vacuum cleaner each time. Then we found this on line and decided to give it a go. And WOW I love it. It’s so simple to use and it sucks up all the grass and hair off the floor perfectly. I refuse to sweep and vacuum 5x a day. With this we can take it out a dozen times very easily. It’s so light weight and it charges quick and holds a charge. I was skeptical but this works perfectly for quick pick up action with out having to take out the broom or the vacuum cleaner. Worth every penny. And it was cheaper than the swifter sweeper we use to buy.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Quiet and effective, few accessories
reviews.reviewText: I wanted a cordless floor vacuum with a passive floor nozzle to pick up hair in my bathroom, and that’s just what it does. Suction is just strong enough to do the job, with the upsides being quiet operation and light weight. It does not make the shrieking sound that most handhelds do; it’s more of a muted high-pitched whine. The color is absolutely wonderful, and I will use it as a color sample when decorating. It comes with the bare minimum: motor, charger, spare filter, extension tube, floor nozzle and a crevice tool. No dust brush or hanger which I would have liked. Emptying the dust cup is neater than some. First the dust cup is removed from the motor and then the filter from the dust cup. There is a screen around the filter that keeps the dirt from sticking to it. I was somewhat amused by the styling of the name "Keromee"; from a distance it looks like "Kenmore". I don't think this is accidental.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars For the price it is very good for small, quick jobs.
reviews.reviewText: I just hope the built in rechargeable batteries continue to accept a charge and run the motor adequately. If not, I will re update. I use around a litter box for litter the cat tracks out. Does very well picking that up. Also good for a quick vacuum through the house when you don't want to drag out the big Hoover with a cord. Basket is easy to empty and clean.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Cup falls off! A big mess.
reviews.reviewText: The vacuum came to me damaged. I'm sure it was a reused one. There was a slight chip on the rim of the cup.I really liked that it was light and very easy to maneuver. Sadly the cup that held the dirt would not stay on. This could be because it was broken and/or a bad design.I should have returned it but unfortunately I had to leave town on an emergency then ran out of time to return it.It just dumped a pile of dirt on the floor and I am going to sweep up the mess and toss the vacuumed in the garbage.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Very Nice For The Money
reviews.reviewText: I am pleased with it for the money. I have a maine coon cat and it did pick up her hair. I love the lightness of it and was very pleased with the assembly of it. Done in 3 minutes. Cleaning the cup out was simple and easy and I charged her right after all was done for the next use. The charge which it came in with lasted approximately 20 minutes. I do not know if that was fully charged. I will see next time I use as now I know I charged her fully. Also did a few throw rugs with low pile great. If you are planning to do an entire big house with it I would not recommend. The area I did was approximately 500 sq. ft. She did a good job.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Lightweight for me
reviews.reviewText: It is a great little vacuum for an elderly or disabled person. Lightweight and easy to maneuver and empty. I have vinyl flooring and with the little roller wheels it make my job super easy. Also with one malti poo it makes quick work of loose hair. It also can be used as a duster with attachment that came with. I don’t know about carpet other than it could handle short tight knitted, but not high pile. It has two settings for suction and the low works fine but if you need more just push the button again. I am very happy with purchase.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Far exceeded my expectations; great little machine
reviews.reviewText: I've had this vacuum for about five months now and came to write a review because I continue to be astounded by the value for the money.Over the past several years I have purchased several cordless stick vacuums, from no-brand to Bissel. They've all been decent but relative to cost, not all that impressive. I hate to create e-waste by purchasing more battery/cordless items, but hauling out the big vacuum for daily pet hair pickup is tedious.This little vacuum does exactly what I need it to: Stay charged long enough to pick up pet hair, tracked-in birdseed and garden debris, and general dust, quickly and easily. It has two power levels and in doing the 1,000 sq ft ground floor of my house, all hardwood or tile, it has not lost battery power yet. That's with a shedding Chihuahua.I've also used it as a handheld short-nozzled vacuum to pick up debris from doing crafts in the kitchen, to swoop crumbs out of silverware drawers, to vacuum the tracks of windows and other odd jobs. The entire unit is lightweight and the suction power is equal to or better than vacuums costing 2 or 3 times as much.It's no frills -- there is no beater brush in the vacuum head, and it only came with long & short extensions - but that is fine. There is no clunky battery - the power charging cord just plugs into the vacuum. It's easy to empty and the debris cup is easy to rinse out. A green flashing light tells you when it's charging.For less than $60 my expectations were low but it's been a very pleasant surprise.
